name: Faith & Pain
description:
Step in to the city of Skyloft where our valiant hero is on a mission to save his sister, Faith from the clutches of an evil cult looking to corrupt the town. 

Can you be the hero Skyloft wants? Can you be the hero Faith needs?

This was my teams university final group project. Some original assets and some pre made assets were used for this project.

Team Members: Path Poojra, William Silva, Chidinma James, Christopher Haemsirirat & Liam Buckmire.
